          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kvadrat dvočlenika - ponazoritev</string>
            <string language="en">Square of the sum of two numbers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quadrat der Summe von zwei Zahlen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Place de la somme de deux nombres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quadrado da soma de dois números</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quadrato della somma di due numeri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τετράγωνο του ποσού δύο αριθμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadrado de la suma de dos números</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">PowerPointova diaprojekcija geometrijske ponazoritve kvadriranja dvočlenika.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation on how to square the sum of two numbers (with algebra and geometry).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kvadriranje</string>
            <string language="en">squaring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vsota</string>
            <string language="en">sum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">geometrija</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung auf, wie man die Summe von zwei 
Zahlen quadriert (mit Algebra und Geometrie).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation sur la façon dont ajuster la somme
de deux nombres (avec l'algèbre et la géométrie).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação em como esquadrar a soma de dois 
números (com álgebra e geometria).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione su come quadrare la somma di due 
numeri (con algebra e la geometria).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση για το πώς να τακτοποιήσει το ποσό δύο 
αριθμών (με την άλγεβρα και τη γεωμετρία).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación en cómo ajustar la suma de dos 
números (con álgebra y geometría).</string>
          </description>
